title: WYSIWYG
subtext: What You See Is What You Get editor
author: Buzzpy

description.title: WYSIWYG
texts: WYSIWYG (What You See Is What You Get) editors are a type of content editor that allows users to see what the final output will look like while the document is being created.
They are commonly used in content management systems to provide an easy-to-use interface for non-technical users.
